sentences.english: METHODS Wet granulation technique was employed to prepare pectin-calcium chloride matrix tablets.

sentences.english: Objective To study the preparation process and quality control method of indomethacin liniment.

sentences.english: Existing studies have only considered indomethacin administration before induction of elevated intracompartment pressure.

sentences.english: In the third chapter, a new approach towards the synthesis of oxyindole is studied.
